Text: Re PersonalsHey its Katie You answered my personal ad sorry it took so long to get back Well I am sitting at home doing nothing I dont know if you are interested still or if you found someone so I dont want to write much I have been playing on my web cam for a few days If you want to chat with me Im usually online after work You dont have to have one but it makes it more fun Ill still talk to you though if you dont Here is how you can get a hold of me webcam There is a thing on there that tells when Im online Email me if you have any problems We can chat on AOL the old fashion way if this doesnt work out Have a fun weekend Katie IMPORTANT TIPS TO REMAIN ANONYMOUS AT Matchcom If you use the reply button to respond to this message please take the following steps DELETE ALL TEXT from the body of your message including header information which may include your actual email address REMOVE ANY AUTOMATIC SIGNATURES which may include your personal contact information Our anonymous remailer will strip away your real email address in the From field so that it will NOT appear in the From line However DO NOT use the Cc or Bcc fields as these addresses CANNOT be stripped away You may also contact this person from their Matchcom profile by clicking Contact this person and composing your message directly from the site Matchcom does not monitor private email between members nor are we liable for the content of these messages All members are bound by our Matchcom Service Agreement
